This is a representative XML file for blocks for the game 7 days to die.  

This blocks.xml file is responsible for defining all the available blocks in the game.

Each block contains a name, along with various properties that control its behaviour, appearance, or functions.

Not all blocks contain the same properties. For example, terrain blocks contain Terrain Indexes and a different shape than other blocks.

Some blocks have a various drop events depending on how the block is interacted with. For example, the block called terrStone has a Harvest, Destroy, and Fall events. This controls which resources are given back to the player, or dropped on the ground, when the block is harvested, destroyed, or if it falls.

Some properties may have similar names, such as Class and class. 

The Class version references which C# class controls its behaviour. For blocks, the keyword "Block" is added to the start of the class automatically. For example, <property name="Class" value="PlantGrowing"/> actually references to the C# class BlockPlantGrowing. 

Class references that contain a comma may reference external assembles loaded from mods. In those cases, the value before the comma is the class name, while the value after the comma is the assembly. For example, "MyBlock, SCore" is a C# class called MyBlock, in the SCore DLL. 

class with a lowercase c allows for group of properties related to an action. For example, an UpgradeBlock's property gets used when a block is being updated. 

Blocks with the property CreativeMode set to None will now show up in the game's creative menu. If set to Dev, it will only show up in the creative menu when dev block toggle is selected.

Terrain blocks have a shape or mesh of terrain, and has a texture id that reads from a texture atlas the game loads

Other non-terrain blocks may use this texture atlas as well.

Material is a cross reference to another file, materials.xml. 

Some properties, such as the name of the block, or any property name's value that ends with Key can be used to read the localization file. This translates the value based on the lanauage from the localization file.


Here is the version of v1.1 blocks.xml:


<!-- Table_of_Contents -->
<!-- Search_Find_All_for *** -->

<!-- REPLACE_THEN_DEPRECATE -->
<!-- TO_BE_REPLACED_LATER -->

<!--
Player Shapes: frameShapes,woodShapes,cobblestoneShapes,concreteShapes,steelShapes
Level Design Shapes: awningShapes,brickShapes,corrugatedMetalShapes

FilterTags:
Main Category - Sub Category
MC_building - SC_construction,SC_destruction,SC_electrical,SC_lighting,SC_decor,SC_industrial,SC_commercial,SC_residential,SC_loot,SC_automotive,SC_plumbing,SC_doors,SC_windows,SC_traps,SC_treasureRoom
MC_outdoor - SC_decor,SC_fences,SC_trees,SC_shrubbery,SC_crops,SC_terrain,SC_signs
MC_helpers - SC_helperIndustrial,SC_helperCommercial,SC_helperResidential,SC_helperOutdoor,SC_helperElectrical,SC_helperSleeper,SC_questblocks,SC_loot,SC_treasureRoom,
MC_playerBlocks - SC_electrical,SC_traps,SC_decor,SC_playerHelpers
-->

<blocks defaultDescriptionKey="creativeMenuBlockGroupDesc">

<!-- *** xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx -->
<!-- **** TERRAIN_VOXELS -->
<!-- *** xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx -->

	<!-- *** AIR -->
<block name="air">
	<property name="Material" value="Mair"/>
	<property name="Shape" value="Invisible"/>
	<property name="Texture" value="250"/>
	<property name="WaterFlow" value="permitted"/>
	<property name="ImposterDontBlock" value="true"/>
	<property name="SortOrder1" value="0000"/>
	<property name="SortOrder2" value="0000"/>
	<property name="Tags" value="air"/>
	<property name="FilterTags" value="MC_outdoor,SC_terrain"/>
</block>

	<!-- *** 0-255_TERRAIN -->
<block name="terrStone">
	<!-- Class -->
	<property name="TerrainIndex" value="1"/>
	<property name="CanMobsSpawnOn" value="true"/>
	<!-- UI_Info -->
	<property name="DisplayType" value="blockTerrain"/>
	<property name="Map.Color" value="100,100,100"/>
	<!-- Visual -->
	<property name="Material" value="Mstone"/>
	<property name="Shape" value="Terrain"/>
	<property name="Mesh" value="terrain"/>
	<property name="Texture" value="1"/>
	<property name="ImposterExclude" value="true"/>
	<property name="LPHardnessScale" value="2"/>
	<!-- Placement -->
	<!-- Value -->
	<property name="EconomicValue" value="5"/>
	<property name="EconomicBundleSize" value="1"/>
	<property name="SellableToTrader" value="false"/>
	<!-- Interaction -->
	<property name="Weight" value="125"/>
	<property name="NoScrapping" value="true"/>
	<property class="RepairItems">
		<property name="resourceCobblestones" value="6"/>
	</property>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceRockSmall" count="55" tag="oreWoodHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Destroy" count="0"/>
	<drop event="Fall" name="resourceRockSmall" count="44" prob="0.23" stick_chance="0"/>
	<drop event="Fall" name="terrDestroyedStone" count="1" prob="0.1" stick_chance="0.5"/>
	<!-- Sorting -->
	<property name="SortOrder1" value="0000"/>
	<property name="SortOrder2" value="0100"/>
	<property name="FilterTags" value="MC_outdoor,SC_terrain"/>
</block>

<block name="terrainFiller">
	<property name="CreativeMode" value="Dev"/>
	<property name="CanMobsSpawnOn" value="true"/>
	<property name="DisplayType" value="blockTerrainFertile"/>
	<property name="Material" value="Mdirt"/>
	<property name="Shape" value="Terrain"/>
	<property name="Mesh" value="terrain"/>
	<property name="Texture" value="403"/>

	<property name="SortOrder2" value="0150"/>
	<property name="FilterTags" value="MC_outdoor,SC_terrain"/>
</block>

	<property name="CustomIcon" value="terrainFiller"/>

	<property name="SortOrder2" value="0200"/>
</block>

	<!-- *** SHAPE_MENU -->
<!-- Shapes are similar to the old master blocks in that they contain the material properties. -->
<!-- The shapes are then combined at run time with the shapes.xml shapes to produce -->
<!-- all of the various block shape and material combinations. -->

<!-- SortOrder2 is assigned in code to keep all of the shapes in the same order for each material -->

<block name="woodShapes" shapes="All">
	<property name="DescriptionKey" value="woodGroupDesc"/>
	<property name="Material" value="Mwood_shapes"/>
	<property name="Shape" value="New"/>
	<property name="Texture" value="241"/>
	<property name="UiBackgroundTexture" value="241"/>
	<property name="FuelValue" value="500"/>
	<property name="EconomicValue" value="10"/>
	<property name="EconomicBundleSize" value="20"/>
	<property class="RepairItems">
		<property name="resourceWood" value="3"/>
	</property>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceWood" count="2" tag="allHarvest,lumberjackHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Destroy" count="0"/>
	<drop event="Fall" name="terrDestroyedWoodDebris" count="1" prob="0.75" stick_chance="1"/>
	<property class="UpgradeBlock">
		<property name="ToBlock" value="cobblestoneShapes"/>
		<property name="Item" value="resourceCobblestones"/>
		<property name="ItemCount" value="10"/>
		<property name="UpgradeHitCount" value="4"/>
	</property>
	<property name="UpgradeSound" value="place_block_wood"/>
	<property name="SortOrder1" value="S000"/>
	<!-- SortOrder2 is assigned in code to keep all of the shapes in the same order for each material -->
	<property name="Group" value="Building,advBuilding"/>
	<property name="Tags" value="wood"/>
	<property name="FilterTags" value="MC_Shapes"/>
</block>

	<!-- *** MASTER_MATERIAL_BLOCKS -->

<!-- Master blocks are material based because it means that the repair and upgrade resources -->
<!-- only need to be listed once. -->
<!-- Master blocks never list downgrade blocks but do list a dummy upgrade block to supply default resources for the upgrade. -->
<!-- The default for a block is shape="new" and model="cube" -->
<!-- "CreativeMode" is not inherited on "Extends". This is intentional. -->
<!-- <property name="DescriptionKey" value="scrapIronGroupDesc"/> group description for stuff like metal siding -->

<block name="woodWeakNoUpgradeMaster">
	<property name="CreativeMode" value="None"/>
	<property name="DescriptionKey" value="woodFrameGroupDesc"/>
	<property name="Material" value="Mwood_weak"/>
	<property name="Texture" value="241"/>
	<property name="EconomicValue" value="5"/>
	<property name="EconomicBundleSize" value="20"/>
	<property name="FuelValue" value="100"/>
	<property class="RepairItems">
		<property name="resourceWood" value="3"/>
	</property>
	<drop event="Destroy" name="resourceWood" count="1,2"/>
	<drop event="Fall" name="terrDestroyedWoodDebris" count="1" prob="0.3" stick_chance="1"/>
	<property name="UpgradeSound" value="place_block_wood"/>
	<property name="SortOrder1" value="M000"/>
	<property name="SortOrder2" value="0000"/>
	<property name="Group" value="Building,advBuilding"/>
	<property name="Tags" value="wood"/>
	<property name="FilterTags" value="MC_building"/>
</block>

<block name="woodNoUpgradeMaster">

<block name="woodMaster">
	<property name="Extends" value="woodNoUpgradeMaster"/>
	<property name="CreativeMode" value="None"/>

	<property class="UpgradeBlock">

	<!-- *** CAMPFIRE -->
<block name="campfire">
	<!-- Class -->
	<property name="Class" value="Campfire"/>
	<property class="Workstation">
		<property name="Modules" value="tools,output,fuel,input"/>
		<property name="Collide" value="melee,bullet,arrow,rocket"/>
	</property>
	<!-- UI_Info -->
	<property name="CreativeMode" value="Player"/>
	<property name="DescriptionKey" value="campfireDesc"/>
	<property name="WorkstationIcon" value="ui_game_symbol_campfire"/>
	<property name="CraftIcon" value="ui_game_symbol_spatula"/>
	<property name="CraftActionName" value="lblContextActionCook"/>
	<property name="Stacknumber" value="1"/>
	<!-- Visual -->
	<property name="Material" value="MstoneNoGlue"/>
	<property name="Shape" value="ModelEntity"/>
	<property name="Model" value="Entities/Crafting/campfireCookStationPrefab"/>
	<property name="ImposterDontBlock" value="true"/>
	<property name="WaterFlow" value="permitted"/>
	<property name="ParticleName" value="campfire"/>
	<property name="ParticleOffset" value="0.5,0.1,0.5"/>
	<!-- Placement -->
	<property name="Place" value="TowardsPlacer90"/>
	<property name="Collide" value="movement,melee,bullet,arrow,rocket"/>
	<property name="IsTerrainDecoration" value="true"/>
	<property name="StabilitySupport" value="false"/>
	<!-- Value -->
	<property name="EconomicValue" value="5"/>
	<property name="EconomicBundleSize" value="1"/>
	<property name="SellableToTrader" value="false"/>
	<!-- Interaction -->
	<property name="MaxDamage" value="100"/>
	<property name="HeatMapStrength" value="5"/>
	<property name="HeatMapTime" value="5000"/>
	<property name="HeatMapFrequency" value="1000"/>
	<property name="BuffsWhenWalkedOn" value="buffBurningEnvironment"/>
	<property name="ActiveRadiusEffects" value="buffCampfireAOE(3)"/>
	<property name="OpenSound" value="campfire_open"/>
	<property name="CloseSound" value="campfire_close"/>
	<property name="CraftSound" value="campfire_cook_click"/>
	<property name="CraftCompleteSound" value="campfire_complete_item"/>
	<property class="RepairItems">
		<property name="resourceRockSmall" value="5"/>
	</property>
	<drop event="Destroy" name="resourceRockSmall" count="3"/>
	<!-- Sorting -->
	<property name="SortOrder1" value="B281"/>
	<property name="SortOrder2" value="0000"/>
	<property name="Group" value="Basics,Food/Cooking,Building,advBuilding"/>
	<property name="FilterTags" value="MC_playerBlocks,SC_decor"/>
	<property name="SoundPickup" value="campfire_grab"/>
	<property name="SoundPlace" value="campfire_place"/>
</block>

	<!-- *** DEW_COLLECTOR -->
<block name="cntDewCollector">
	<property name="Class" value="DewCollector"/>
	<property name="UnlockedBy" value="craftingWorkstations"/>
	<property name="WorkstationIcon" value="ui_game_symbol_water"/>
	<property name="CreativeMode" value="Player"/>
	<property name="DescriptionKey" value="dewCollectorDesc"/>

	<property name="Shape" value="ModelEntity"/>
	<property name="Model" value="Entities/Furniture/collectorDewPrefab"/>
	<property name="MultiBlockDim" value="3,3,3"/>
	<property name="ImposterExchange" value="imposterBlock" param1="77"/>
	<property name="WaterFlow" value="permitted"/>
	<property name="Place" value="TowardsPlacerInverted"/>
	<property name="RestrictSubmergedPlacement" value="true"/>
	<property name="AllowedRotations" value="Basic90"/>
	<property name="Path" value="solid"/>
	<property name="IsDecoration" value="true"/>
	<property name="StabilitySupport" value="false"/>
	<property name="OpenSound" value="collector_open"/>
	<property name="CloseSound" value="collector_close"/>
	<property name="ConvertSound" value="collector_complete_item"/>
	<property name="MinConvertTime" value="21600"/> <!-- 21600 Game Seconds = 6 Game Hours -->
	<property name="MaxConvertTime" value="36000"/> <!-- 36000 Game Seconds = 10 Game Hours -->
	<property name="ConvertToItem" value="drinkJarRiverWater"/>
	<property name="ModdedConvertToItem" value="drinkJarBoiledWater"/>
	<property name="ModdedConvertSpeed" value="2"/>
	<property name="ModdedConvertCount" value="2"/>
	<property name="ModTransformNames" value="1,2,3"/>
	<property name="ModTypes" value="Speed,Count,Type"/>
	<property name="EconomicValue" value="5"/>

<!-- White -->
<block name="commercialDoorV3White">
	<!-- Class -->
	<property name="Class" value="DoorSecure"/>
	<property name="OpenSound" value="door_metal_open"/>
	<property name="CloseSound" value="door_metal_close"/>
	<property name="IndexName" value="TraderOnOff"/>
	<!-- UI_Info -->
	<property name="CustomIconTint" value="B7B4AB"/>
	<property name="TintColor" value="B7B4AB"/>
	<property name="DescriptionKey" value="doorGroupDesc"/>
	<property name="DisplayType" value="blockMulti"/>
	<property name="Stacknumber" value="500"/>
	<!-- Visual -->
	<property name="Material" value="Mmetal"/>
	<property name="Shape" value="ModelEntity"/>
	<property name="Model" value="Entities/Doors/commercialDoorV3/commercialDoorV3Prefab"/>
	<property name="ModelOffset" value="0,0,0"/>
	<property name="MultiBlockDim" value="1,2,1"/>
	<property name="ImposterExchange" value="imposterBlock" param1="25"/>
	<property name="LightOpacity" value="1"/>
	<property name="WaterFlow" value="permitted"/>
	<!-- Placement -->
	<property name="Place" value="Door"/>
	<property name="PlaceEverywhere" value="true"/>
	<property name="AllowAllRotations" value="true"/>
	<property name="StabilitySupport" value="false"/>
	<!-- Value -->
	<property name="EconomicValue" value="1"/>
	<property name="SellableToTrader" value="false"/>
	<!-- Interaction -->
	<property name="MaxDamage" value="1000"/>
	<property name="StartDamage" value="0"/>
	<property name="PassThroughDamage" value="true"/>
	<property name="Stage2Health" value="1"/>
	<property name="MeshDamage" value="
		Door/DMG0, 1000,
		Door/DMG1, 750,
		Door/DMG2, 500,
		Door/DMG3, 250,
		-, 1
		"/>
	<property class="RepairItems">
		<property name="resourceForgedIron" value="9"/>
	</property>
	<property class="RepairItemsMeshDamage">
		<property name="resourceForgedIron" value="2"/>
	</property>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceScrapIron" count="8,15" tag="allHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Destroy" name="resourceScrapIron" count="10" tag="allHarvest"/>
	<property name="DestroyFX" value="door_damage_metal,metaldestroy"/>
	<drop event="Fall" name="scrapMetalPile" count="1" prob="0.75" stick_chance="1"/>
	<!-- Sorting -->
	<property name="SortOrder1" value="B315"/>
	<property name="SortOrder2" value="0000"/>
	<property name="Group" value="Building,advBuilding"/>
	<property name="Tags" value="door"/>
	<property name="BlockTag" value="Door"/>
	<property name="FilterTags" value="MC_building,SC_doors"/>
</block>

	<!-- *** ELEVATOR_DOORS -->
<block name="elevatorDoor">
	<!-- Class -->
	<property name="Class" value="DoorSecure"/>
	<property name="OpenSound" value="doors_elevator_open"/>
	<property name="CloseSound" value="doors_elevator_close"/>
	<property name="LockedSound" value="door_elevator_locked"/>
	<property name="IndexName" value="TraderOnOff"/>
	<!-- UI_Info -->
	<property name="DescriptionKey" value="doorGroupDesc"/>
	<property name="DisplayType" value="blockMulti"/>
	<property name="Stacknumber" value="500"/>
	<!-- Visual -->
	<property name="Material" value="Msteel"/>
	<property name="Shape" value="ModelEntity"/>
	<property name="Model" value="Entities/Doors/elevatorDoor/elevatorDoorPrefab"/>
	<property name="ModelOffset" value="0.5,0,0.5"/>
	<property name="MultiBlockDim" value="1,2,1"/>
	<property name="ImposterExchange" value="imposterBlock" param1="25"/>
	<property name="LightOpacity" value="1"/>
	<property name="WaterFlow" value="permitted"/>
	<!-- Placement -->
	<property name="Place" value="Door"/>
	<property name="PlaceEverywhere" value="true"/>
	<property name="AllowAllRotations" value="true"/>
	<property name="StabilitySupport" value="false"/>
	<!-- Value -->
	<property name="EconomicValue" value="1"/>
	<property name="SellableToTrader" value="false"/>
	<!-- Interaction -->
	<property name="MaxDamage" value="10000"/>
	<property name="StartDamage" value="0"/>
	<property name="PassThroughDamage" value="true"/>
	<property name="MeshDamage" value="
		Door/DMG0, 10000"/>
	<property class="RepairItems">
		<property name="resourceForgedIron" value="10"/>
	</property>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceScrapIron" count="20,40" tag="allHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Destroy" name="resourceScrapIron" count="20,40" tag="allHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Fall" name="scrapMetalPile" count="1" prob="0.75" stick_chance="1"/>
	<!-- Sorting -->
	<property name="Group" value="Building,advBuilding"/>
	<property name="SortOrder1" value="B317"/>
	<property name="SortOrder2" value="0000"/>
	<property name="Tags" value="door"/>
	<property name="BlockTag" value="Door"/>
	<property name="FilterTags" value="MC_building,SC_doors"/>
</block>

<block name="ironGarageDoorWhite">
	<!-- Class -->
	<property name="Class" value="DoorSecure"/>
	<property name="OpenSound" value="open_garage_door"/>
	<property name="CloseSound" value="close_garage_door"/>
	<property name="IndexName" value="TraderOnOff"/>
	<!-- UI_Info -->
	<property name="CustomIconTint" value="949494"/>
	<property name="TintColor" value="949494"/>
	<property name="DescriptionKey" value="doorGroupDesc"/>
	<property name="DisplayType" value="blockMulti"/>
	<property name="Stacknumber" value="500"/>
	<!-- Visual -->
	<property name="Material" value="MmetalGarageDoor3x2x2"/> <!-- hidden explosion resist to account for multiblock area -->
	<property name="Shape" value="ModelEntity"/>
	<property name="Model" value="Entities/Doors/ironGarageDoor/ironGarageDoorPrefab"/>
	<property name="ModelOffset" value="0,0,1"/>
	<property name="MultiBlockDim" value="3,2,2"/>
	<property name="ImposterExchange" value="imposterBlock" param1="25"/>
	<property name="LightOpacity" value="1"/>
	<property name="WaterFlow" value="permitted"/>
	<!-- Placement -->
	<property name="Place" value="Door"/>
	<property name="PlaceEverywhere" value="true"/>
	<property name="AllowAllRotations" value="true"/>
	<property name="StabilitySupport" value="false"/>
	<!-- Value -->
	<property name="EconomicValue" value="1"/>
	<property name="SellableToTrader" value="false"/>
	<!-- Interaction -->
	<property name="MaxDamage" value="10000"/>
	<property name="StartDamage" value="0"/>
	<property name="PassThroughDamage" value="true"/>
	<property name="MeshDamage" value="
		Door/DMG0, 10000,
		Door/DMG1, 7500,
		Door/DMG2, 5000,
		Door/DMG3, 2500,
		"/>
	<property class="RepairItems">
		<property name="resourceForgedIron" value="9"/>
	</property>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceScrapIron" count="100" tag="allHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Destroy" count="0"/>
	<drop event="Fall" name="scrapMetalPile" count="1" prob="0.75" stick_chance="1"/>
	<!-- Sorting -->
	<property name="SortOrder1" value="B319"/>
	<property name="SortOrder2" value="0000"/>
	<property name="Group" value="Building,advBuilding"/>
	<property name="Tags" value="door"/>
	<property name="BlockTag" value="Door"/>
	<property name="FilterTags" value="MC_building,SC_doors"/>
</block>

		Door/DMG1, 5000,
		Door/DMG2, 2500,
		"/>

		<property name="resourceWood" value="10"/>
	</property>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="terrStone" count="0" tool_category="Disassemble"/>

	<drop event="Destroy" name="resourceWood" count="10" tag="allHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Destroy" name="resourceSpring" count="2,4" tag="salvageHarvest" tool_category="Disassemble"/>
	<drop event="Destroy" name="resourceMechanicalParts" count="2,4" tag="salvageHarvest" tool_category="Disassemble"/>
	<drop event="Fall" name="terrDestroyedWoodDebris" count="1" prob="0.75" stick_chance="1"/>

	<property name="Shape" value="ModelEntity"/>

	<property name="ImposterExchange" value="imposterBlock" param1="35"/>

	<property name="WaterFlow" value="permitted"/>

		DMG0, 30000,
		DMG1, 20000,
		DMG2, 10000
		"/>

	</property>

	<drop event="Destroy" count="0"/>

	<property name="ModelOffset" value="0,0,0"/>
	<property name="MultiBlockDim" value="1,2,1"/>
	<property name="WaterFlow" value="permitted"/>
	<property name="Place" value="TowardsPlacerInverted"/>
	<property name="Collide" value="movement,melee,bullet,arrow,rocket"/>
	<property name="IsTerrainDecoration" value="true"/>
	<property name="StabilitySupport" value="false"/>
	<property name="FuelValue" value="150"/>
	<property name="EconomicValue" value="12"/>
	<property class="RepairItems">
		<property name="resourceForgedIron" value="2"/>
		<property name="resourceWood" value="3"/>
	</property>
	<drop event="Destroy" name="resourceScrapIron" count="5"/>

	<property name="SortOrder2" value="9000"/>
	<property name="FilterTags" value="MC_building,SC_residential,MC_outdoor,SC_decor"/>
</block>

	<property name="Place" value="TowardsPlacer"/>
	<property name="Collide" value="sight,movement,melee,bullet,arrow,rocket"/>
	<property name="Path" value="solid"/>
	<property name="IsTerrainDecoration" value="true"/>
	<property name="EconomicValue" value="690"/>

	<property class="RepairItems">
		<property name="resourceForgedSteel" value="30"/>
	</property>
	<drop event="Destroy" count="0"/>
	<drop event="Fall" name="scrapMetalPile" count="1" prob="0.75" stick_chance="1"/>
	<property name="DowngradeBlock" value="cntATMInsecure"/>
	<property name="SortOrder1" value="B453"/>
	<property name="SortOrder2" value="0000"/>
	<property name="Group" value="Building,advBuilding"/>
	<property name="Tags" value="safes,timecharge,lockedSafe"/>

	<property name="CreativeMode" value="None"/>
	<property name="Class" value="Loot"/>

	<!-- *** GAS_PUMPS -->
<block name="cntGasPumpRandomLootHelper">
	<property name="CreativeMode" value="Dev"/>
	<property name="Class" value="CarExplodeLoot"/>
	<property name="LootList" value="gasPump"/>
	<property class="Explosion">
		<property name="ParticleIndex" value="30"/> <!-- which prefab/particle is used -->
		<property name="RadiusBlocks" value="5"/> <!-- damage radius for blocks -->
		<property name="BlockDamage" value="5000"/> <!-- damage for blocks in the center of the explosion -->
		<property name="RadiusEntities" value="3"/> <!-- damage radius for entities -->
		<property name="EntityDamage" value="150"/> <!-- damage for entities in the center of the explosion -->
	</property>
	<property name="CustomIcon" value="cntGasPumpFull"/>
	<property name="CustomIconTint" value="ff8080"/>
	<property name="ItemTypeIcon" value="other"/>
	<property name="DisplayInfo" value="Name"/>
	<property name="Material" value="Mmetal_thin"/>
	<property name="Shape" value="ModelEntity"/>
	<property name="Model" value="Entities/Industrial/gasPumpFullPrefab"/>
	<property name="ImposterExchange" value="imposterDontBlockCTRPlate" param1="90"/>
	<property name="WaterFlow" value="permitted"/>
	<property name="Place" value="TowardsPlacerInverted"/>
	<property name="Path" value="solid"/>
	<property name="IsTerrainDecoration" value="true"/>
	<property name="EconomicValue" value="400"/> <!-- disassemble value -->
	<property name="LPHardnessScale" value="0"/> <!-- disable LP for TNT blocks -->
	<property class="RepairItems">
		<property name="resourceForgedSteel" value="10"/>
	</property>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="terrStone" count="0" tool_category="Disassemble"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceElectricParts" count="2,6" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceMechanicalParts" count="2,4" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceForgedIron" count="1,3" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceForgedSteel" count="2,3" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceScrapPolymers" count="2,5" tag="allHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceSpring" count="1,3" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Destroy" name="resourceScrapIron" count="1,15"/>
	<drop event="Destroy" count="0"/>
	<drop event="Fall" name="scrapMetalPile" count="1" prob="0.75" stick_chance="1"/>
	<property name="SortOrder1" value="B477"/>
	<property name="SortOrder2" value="0000"/>
	<property name="FilterTags" value="MC_helpers,SC_loot,SC_helperCommercial"/>
	<property name="Tags" value="barrelExplosive,challenge_elec_parts,challenge_mech_parts,challenge_steel"/>
	<property name="IndexName" value="challenge_steel"/>

	<property name="LootList" value="cars"/>
	<property class="Explosion">
		<property name="ParticleIndex" value="31"/> <!-- which prefab/particle is used -->
		<property name="RadiusBlocks" value="3.5"/> <!-- damage radius for blocks -->
		<property name="BlockDamage" value="500"/> <!-- damage for blocks in the center of the explosion -->
		<property name="RadiusEntities" value="5"/> <!-- damage radius for entities -->
		<property name="EntityDamage" value="250"/> <!-- damage for entities in the center of the explosion -->
	</property>
	<property name="CustomIcon" value="cntCar03SedanDamage1Master"/>
	<property name="ItemTypeIcon" value="explosion"/>
	<property name="TintColor" value="B0B0B0"/>
	<property name="DisplayType" value="blockMulti"/>
	<property name="Material" value="Mmetal"/>
	<property name="Shape" value="ModelEntity"/>
	<property name="Model" value="@:Entities/Vehicles/Car/car_black_dmg1Prefab.prefab"/>

	<property name="OversizedBounds" value="(-0.5,0.5,-0.5),(2,2,6)"/>
	<property name="ImposterDontBlock" value="true"/>
	<property name="WaterFlow" value="permitted"/>
	<property name="ParticleOnDeath" value="car_destruction_dmg2"/> <!-- VFX putback in play, added *dmg2-->
	<property name="Place" value="TowardsPlacer"/>
	<property name="PlacementDistance" value="6"/>
	<property name="BigDecorationRadius" value="5"/>
	<property name="IsTerrainDecoration" value="true"/>
	<property name="CanDecorateOnSlopes" value="false"/>
	<property name="PassThroughDamage" value="true"/>
	<property name="ShowModelOnFall" value="false"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="terrStone" count="0" tool_category="Disassemble"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="smallEngine" count="1" prob="0.25" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="carBattery" count="1" prob="0.25" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceRadiator" count="1" prob="0.5" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="ammoGasCan" count="50,200" tag="salvageHarvest"/>

	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceScrapIron" count="17,35" tag="allHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Destroy" count="0"/>
	<property name="DowngradeBlock" value="cntCar03SedanDamage2Master"/>
	<property name="SortOrder1" value="B852"/>
	<property name="SortOrder2" value="0000"/>

	<property name="LootList" value="cars"/>
	<property class="Explosion">
		<property name="ParticleIndex" value="30"/> <!-- which prefab/particle is used -->
		<property name="RadiusBlocks" value="3.5"/> <!-- damage radius for blocks -->
		<property name="BlockDamage" value="500"/> <!-- damage for blocks in the center of the explosion -->
		<property name="RadiusEntities" value="5"/> <!-- damage radius for entities -->
		<property name="EntityDamage" value="250"/> <!-- damage for entities in the center of the explosion -->
	</property>

	<drop event="Harvest" name="smallEngine" count="0,1" prob=".5" tag="salvageHarvest"/>

	<property name="ItemTypeIcon" value="other"/>
	<property name="DisplayInfo" value="Name"/>
	<property name="Material" value="Mmetal"/>
	<property name="Shape" value="ModelEntity"/>
	<property name="Model" value="@:Entities/Vehicles/FrontCrumpledSedan/frontCrumpledSedanPrefab.prefab"/>
	<property name="ModelOffset" value="-0.5,0,0"/>
	<property name="OversizedBounds" value="(-0.5,0.5,0),(2,2,5)"/>
	<property name="ImposterDontBlock" value="true"/>
	<property name="WaterFlow" value="permitted"/>
	<property name="Place" value="TowardsPlacer"/>
	<property name="PlacementDistance" value="8"/>
	<property name="BigDecorationRadius" value="5"/>
	<property name="IsTerrainDecoration" value="true"/>
	<property name="IsReplaceRandom" value="false"/>
	<property name="CanDecorateOnSlopes" value="false"/>
	<drop event="Destroy" count="0"/>
	<property name="ShowModelOnFall" value="false"/>
	<property name="SortOrder1" value="B859"/>
	<property name="SortOrder2" value="H000"/>
	<property name="FilterTags" value="MC_helpers,SC_helperOutdoor"/>
</block>

<!-- White -->
<block name="cntFrontCrumpledSedan01White">
	<property name="CreativeMode" value="Player"/>
	<property name="Class" value="CarExplodeLoot"/>
	<property name="IndexName" value="challenge_cars"/>
	<property name="TerrainAlignment" value="Vehicle"/>
	<property name="LootList" value="cars"/>
	<property class="Explosion">
		<property name="ParticleIndex" value="30"/> <!-- which prefab/particle is used -->
		<property name="RadiusBlocks" value="3.5"/> <!-- damage radius for blocks -->
		<property name="BlockDamage" value="500"/> <!-- damage for blocks in the center of the explosion -->
		<property name="RadiusEntities" value="5"/> <!-- damage radius for entities -->
		<property name="EntityDamage" value="250"/> <!-- damage for entities in the center of the explosion -->
	</property>
	<property name="CustomIconTint" value="CCCCCC"/>
	<property name="ItemTypeIcon" value="explosion"/>
	<property name="TintColor" value="A0A0A0"/>
	<property name="DisplayType" value="blockMulti"/>
	<property name="Material" value="Mmetal"/>
	<property name="Shape" value="ModelEntity"/>
	<property name="Model" value="@:Entities/Vehicles/FrontCrumpledSedan/frontCrumpledSedanPrefab.prefab"/>
	<property name="ModelOffset" value="-0.5,0,0"/>
	<property name="OversizedBounds" value="(-0.5,0.5,0),(2,2,5)"/>
	<property name="ImposterDontBlock" value="true"/>
	<property name="WaterFlow" value="permitted"/>
	<property name="ParticleOnDeath" value="car_destruction_dmg1"/>
	<property name="Place" value="TowardsPlacer"/>
	<property name="PlacementDistance" value="6"/>
	<property name="BigDecorationRadius" value="5"/>
	<property name="IsTerrainDecoration" value="true"/>
	<property name="CanDecorateOnSlopes" value="false"/>
	<property name="MaxDamage" value="1000"/>
	<property name="PassThroughDamage" value="true"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="terrStone" count="0" tool_category="Disassemble"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="smallEngine" count="0,1" prob=".5" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="carBattery" count="0,1" prob=".4" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceAcid" count="1" prob=".15" tag="WasteTreasuresAcidHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceRadiator" count="0,1" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceMechanicalParts" count="4,10" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceElectricParts" count="1,5" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceHeadlight" count="1,2" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="ammoGasCan" count="50,200" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceOil" count="0,3" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceScrapPolymers" count="8,22" tag="allHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceSpring" count="3,6" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceMetalPipe" count="5" prob="0.5" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceScrapIron" count="70,180" tag="allHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceCloth" count="10,20" tag="allHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Destroy" count="0"/>
	<property name="ShowModelOnFall" value="false"/>
	<property name="SortOrder1" value="B859"/>
	<property name="SortOrder2" value="0000"/>
	<property name="Tags" value="challenge_cars,challenge_elec_parts,challenge_mech_parts,challenge_sinks"/>
	<property name="FilterTags" value="MC_building,SC_automotive"/>
</block>

	<property name="LootList" value="cars"/>
	<property name="CustomIcon" value="cntSUV01White"/>
	<property name="CustomIconTint" value="ff8080"/>
	<property name="ItemTypeIcon" value="other"/>
	<property name="DisplayInfo" value="Name"/>
	<property name="Material" value="Mmetal"/>
	<property name="Shape" value="ModelEntity"/>
	<property name="Model" value="@:Entities/Vehicles/SUV/suvPrefab.prefab"/>
	<property name="ModelOffset" value="-0.5,0,-0.5"/>
	<property name="OversizedBounds" value="(-0.5,0.5,-0.5),(2,2,6)"/>
	<property name="ImposterDontBlock" value="true"/>
	<property name="WaterFlow" value="permitted"/>
	<property name="Place" value="TowardsPlacer"/>
	<property name="PlacementDistance" value="8"/>
	<property name="BigDecorationRadius" value="5"/>
	<property name="IsTerrainDecoration" value="true"/>
	<property name="IsReplaceRandom" value="false"/>
	<property name="CanDecorateOnSlopes" value="false"/>
	<drop event="Destroy" count="0"/>
	<property name="ShowModelOnFall" value="false"/>
	<property name="SortOrder1" value="B862"/>
	<property name="SortOrder2" value="H000"/>
	<property name="FilterTags" value="MC_helpers,SC_helperOutdoor"/>
</block>

<!-- White -->
<block name="cntSUV01White">
	<property name="CreativeMode" value="Player"/>
	<property name="Class" value="CarExplodeLoot"/>
	<property name="IndexName" value="challenge_cars"/>
	<property name="TerrainAlignment" value="Vehicle"/>
	<property name="LootList" value="cars"/>
	<property class="Explosion">
		<property name="ParticleIndex" value="30"/> <!-- which prefab/particle is used -->
		<property name="RadiusBlocks" value="3.5"/> <!-- damage radius for blocks -->
		<property name="BlockDamage" value="500"/> <!-- damage for blocks in the center of the explosion -->
		<property name="RadiusEntities" value="5"/> <!-- damage radius for entities -->
		<property name="EntityDamage" value="250"/> <!-- damage for entities in the center of the explosion -->
	</property>
	<property name="CustomIconTint" value="CCCCCC"/>
	<property name="TintColor" value="A0A0A0"/>
	<property name="ItemTypeIcon" value="explosion"/>
	<property name="DisplayType" value="blockMulti"/>
	<property name="Material" value="Mmetal"/>
	<property name="Shape" value="ModelEntity"/>
	<property name="Model" value="@:Entities/Vehicles/SUV/suvPrefab.prefab"/>
	<property name="ModelOffset" value="-0.5,0,-0.5"/>
	<property name="OversizedBounds" value="(-0.5,0.5,-0.5),(2,2,6)"/>
	<property name="ImposterDontBlock" value="true"/>
	<property name="WaterFlow" value="permitted"/>
	<property name="ParticleOnDeath" value="car_destruction_dmg1"/>
	<property name="Place" value="TowardsPlacer"/>
	<property name="PlacementDistance" value="6"/>
	<property name="BigDecorationRadius" value="5"/>
	<property name="IsTerrainDecoration" value="true"/>
	<property name="CanDecorateOnSlopes" value="false"/>
	<property name="MaxDamage" value="1000"/>
	<property name="PassThroughDamage" value="true"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="terrStone" count="0" tool_category="Disassemble"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="smallEngine" count="0,1" prob=".5" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="carBattery" count="0,1" prob=".4" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceAcid" count="1" prob=".15" tag="WasteTreasuresAcidHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceRadiator" count="0,1" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceMechanicalParts" count="4,10" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceElectricParts" count="1,5" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceHeadlight" count="1,2" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="ammoGasCan" count="50,200" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceOil" count="0,3" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceScrapPolymers" count="8,22" tag="allHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceSpring" count="3,6" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceMetalPipe" count="5" prob="0.5" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceScrapIron" count="70,180" tag="allHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceCloth" count="10,20" tag="allHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Destroy" count="0"/>
	<property name="ShowModelOnFall" value="false"/>
	<property name="SortOrder1" value="B862"/>
	<property name="SortOrder2" value="0000"/>
	<property name="Tags" value="challenge_cars,challenge_elec_parts,challenge_mech_parts,challenge_sinks"/>
	<property name="FilterTags" value="MC_building,SC_automotive"/>
</block>

	<!-- *** BUSES -->
<block name="cntBusSchool">
	<property name="Class" value="CarExplodeLoot"/>
	<property name="IndexName" value="challenge_cars"/>
	<property name="TerrainAlignment" value="Vehicle"/>
	<property name="LootList" value="cars"/>
	<property class="Explosion">
		<property name="ParticleIndex" value="30"/> <!-- which prefab/particle is used -->
		<property name="RadiusBlocks" value="5"/> <!-- damage radius for blocks -->
		<property name="BlockDamage" value="5000"/> <!-- damage for blocks in the center of the explosion -->
		<property name="RadiusEntities" value="5"/> <!-- damage radius for entities -->
		<property name="EntityDamage" value="250"/> <!-- damage for entities in the center of the explosion -->
	</property>
	<property name="ItemTypeIcon" value="explosion"/>
	<property name="DisplayType" value="blockHardenedMulti"/>
	<property name="Material" value="Mmetal_hard"/>
	<property name="Shape" value="ModelEntity"/>
	<property name="Path" value="solid"/>
	<property name="Model" value="@:Entities/Vehicles/busPrefab.prefab"/>
	<property name="ModelOffset" value="0.5,0.5,0"/> <!-- buses are shifted in the fbx file -->
	<property name="OversizedBounds" value="(0,1.5,-0.5),(3,4,12)"/>
	<property name="ImposterDontBlock" value="true"/>
	<property name="WaterFlow" value="permitted"/>
	<property name="ParticleOnDeath" value="car_destruction_dmg5"/> <!-- VFX putback in play, added for bus*dmg5-->
	<property name="Place" value="TowardsPlacer"/>
	<property name="PlacementDistance" value="15"/>
	<property name="Collide" value="sight,movement,melee,bullet,arrow,rocket"/>
	<property name="BigDecorationRadius" value="5"/>
	<property name="CanDecorateOnSlopes" value="false"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="terrStone" count="0" tool_category="Disassemble"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="smallEngine" count="0,1" prob=".5" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="carBattery" count="0,1" prob=".4" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceAcid" count="1" prob=".15" tag="WasteTreasuresAcidHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceRadiator" count="0,1" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceMechanicalParts" count="4,10" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceElectricParts" count="1,5" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceHeadlight" count="1,2" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="ammoGasCan" count="50,200" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceOil" count="0,3" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceScrapPolymers" count="8,22" tag="allHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceSpring" count="3,6" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceMetalPipe" count="5" prob="0.5" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceScrapIron" count="70,180" tag="allHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceCloth" count="10,20" tag="allHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Destroy" count="0"/>
	<drop event="Fall" name="scrapMetalPile" count="1" prob="0.75" stick_chance="1"/>
	<property name="ShowModelOnFall" value="false"/>
	<property name="SortOrder1" value="B871"/>
	<property name="SortOrder2" value="0000"/>
	<property name="Tags" value="challenge_cars,challenge_elec_parts,challenge_mech_parts,challenge_sinks"/>
	<property name="FilterTags" value="MC_building,SC_automotive"/>
</block>

	<!-- *** STUMPS -->
<!-- World deco -->
<block name="treeStump">
	<property name="Material" value="MtreeWoodSmall"/>
	<property name="CreativeMode" value="None"/>
	<property name="IsPlant" value="true"/> <!-- it shall never be placed on rocks -->
	<property name="IndexName" value="challenge_stump"/>
	<property name="Shape" value="ModelEntity"/>
	<property name="Model" value="#Entities/Trees?Prefabs/Stump.prefab"/>
	<property name="ModelOffset" value="0,0,0"/>
	<property name="ImposterDontBlock" value="true"/>
	<property name="WaterFlow" value="permitted"/>
	<property name="Path" value="solid"/>
	<property name="BigDecorationRadius" value="3"/>
	<property name="IsTerrainDecoration" value="true"/>
	<property name="StabilitySupport" value="false"/>
	<drop event="Harvest" name="resourceWood" count="20,30" tag="oreWoodHarvest,lumberjackHarvest"/>
	<drop event="Destroy" name="foodHoney" count="1" prob=".2"/>
	<property name="SortOrder1" value="B907"/>
	<property name="SortOrder2" value="0000"/>
	<property name="Tags" value="wood,challenge_stump"/>
	<property name="FilterTags" value="MC_outdoor,SC_trees"/>
</block>

	<!-- *** TREE_HELPERS -->
<block name="treeSmallRandomHelper">
	<property name="Extends" value="treeOakSml01"/>
	<property name="CreativeMode" value="Dev"/>
	<property name="PlantGrowing.FertileLevel" value="0"/>

	<!-- *** LAYOUT_HELPER_BLOCKS -->
<block name="arrowHelper"> <!-- Green -->
	<property name="CreativeMode" value="Dev"/>

<!-- *** xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx -->
<!-- **** NEW_BLOCKS_FROM_ART_TEAM -->
<!-- *** xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx -->








</blocks>

<!-- Block limit: There can be 32k blocks in the game. -->
<!-- 0-255 are reserved for air/terrain blocks. -->
<!-- IDs are generated internally on loading the game/blocks/items (1 byte for terrain, 2 for the rest). -->

<!-- Note that CreativeMode=Test means that they only show in the creative menu in Unity and with the "Dev Blocks" button on. -->

<!-- Template for adding new SHAPES: -->

<!-- <block name="woodINSERTNEWBLOCKNAME"> -->
	<!-- <property name="Extends" value="woodNoUpgradeMaster"/> -->
	<!-- <property name="CreativeMode" value="Test"/> -->
	<!-- <property name="Shape" value="New"/> -->
	<!-- <property name="Model" value="INSERTNEWSHAPENAME"/> -->
	<!-- <property name="UseGlobalUV" value="Local"/> -->
	<!-- <property name="SortOrder1" value="XXXX"/> -->
	<!-- <property name="SortOrder2" value="XXXX"/> -->
	<!-- <property name="FilterTags" value="MC_building,SC_residential"/> -->
<!-- </block> -->

<!-- Template for adding new MODEL ENTITIES: -->

<!-- <block name="sandbagBlahWhatever"> -->
	<!-- <property name="CreativeMode" value="Test"/> -->
	<!-- <property name="Material" value="Mmetal"/> -->
	<!-- <property name="Shape" value="ModelEntity"/> -->
	<!-- <property name="Model" value="Entities/Sandbags/sandbag_corner_02Prefab"/> -->
	<!-- <property name="SortOrder1" value="XXXX"/> -->
	<!-- <property name="SortOrder2" value="XXXX"/> -->
<!-- </block> -->

<!-- Template for adding new MODEL ENTITY LOOT CONTAINERS: -->

<!-- <block name="cntNewLootContainer"> -->
	<!-- <property name="CreativeMode" value="Test"/> -->
	<!-- <property name="Material" value="Mmetal"/> -->
	<!-- <property name="Shape" value="ModelEntity"/> -->
	<!-- <property name="Model" value="@:Entities/LootContainers/clothsRacksRectangleShirtsPrefab.prefab"/> -->
	<!-- <property name="SortOrder1" value="XXXX"/> -->
	<!-- <property name="SortOrder2" value="XXXX"/> -->
<!-- </block> -->
